title: Giro d’Italia Stage 3: Mads Pedersen Back in Pink After Hammering Home Sprint Victory
content:
Lidl-Trek team controlled a dangerous breakaway on a hilly stage to set the Dane up for second win in three days to return to Italy with pink.
